content: For release on delivery  9:30 a.m. EDT/2:30 p.m. local time  June 20, 2018      Monetary Policy at a Time of Uncertainty and Tight Labor Markets         Remarks by     Jerome H. Powell     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Price and Wage-Setting in Advanced Economies,”   an ECB Forum on Central Banking     Sintra, Portugal    June 20, 2018
